Key:
(Th-This isn't good. If I choose one, I'll
hurt the other.)
(Argh! I'm going to run for it!)

Tohka, I'm sorry! I just remembered that I
have to take care of something!
Hey! Where are you going?! Shido!
Sorry! Go ahead and eat without me!
(Ah... It's so hot.)

(I ran for it... but was that the right thing
to do?)

(While it's true that I had to pick between
one or the other, I'm not quite sure I made
the right decision... *sigh*...)
(Man... I'm hungry...)

(I killed some time before coming back, but...
What could I possibly say?)

(Well.... I still have time before class starts,
so I can apologize to both Tohka and Rinne.)
...T-Tohka? I'm back.
Hm? Oh, Shido, you've returned.

Y-Yeah... Um, sorry. For not eating the
lunch you prepared.
Sh-Shido?
Hm?

Did you... refuse to eat my bento... because
I am a poor cook?

N-No! I-It's not like that. You see, I have
my reasons...

(I was honest, and I told Tohka about
Rinne's bento...)

That's why I thought if I chose one bento
over the other, I would hurt the other person.

Because I couldn't come up with a way not
to hurt either of you, I ran away...

Oh, I see. I feel relief now that I understand
your reasoning. Shido... I forgot you were
like that.

I know you worked so hard to make this,
Tohka. I'm sorry that I didn't eat it.
No, it's fine.
B-But... Uh...
Hm?

I know that I may not be as good as Rinne,
but... would you eat my bento someday...
Shido?

Yeah. I'd love to eat anything you made for
me, Tohka. Actually, today's bento... I can
eat it after school.

No... You took way too long to come back, so...
I ate it myself. Sorry.
No, it's fine. It's all my fault.
Shido, you're back.
Oh Rinne! Um... Er...
*giggle* I know, it's okay.
Huh...?

I heard that Tohka-chan made bento for
lunch today. I made one too, which made
for a predicament, right...?
You see right through me... Sorry Rinne.

Don't worry about me. You have to be the
kind of person you want to meet.
Rinne...
